channel.title: Greater Vancouver Regional District|British Columbia|Canada on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Greater Vancouver Regional District|British Columbia|Canada on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: TC-1 East - Exit 73
item.description: TC-1 east approaching Exit 73 - BC-13 South/264 St./USA Border. Use BC-13 South for the Aldergrove/Lynden border crossing.

item.title: TC-1 East - Exit 66
item.description: TC-1 east at Exit 66 - BC-10/232 St./Langley/Fort Langley.

item.title: TC-1 East - Exit 66
item.description: TC-1 east approaching Exit 66 - BC-10/232 St./Langley/Fort Langley.

item.title: TC-1 East - Exit 58
item.description: TC-1 east approaching Exit 58 - 200 St./Langley City Center./Golden Ears (Toll) Bridge. Continue east on TC-1 for Hope.

item.title: TC-1 East - Exit 57
item.description: TC-1 East approaching Exit 57 - 192 St (North)/Golden Ears (Toll) Bridge.

item.title: End BC-17 East at TC-1 and BC-15
item.description: End BC-17 East at TC-1 and BC-15 in Surrey. Merge right for TC-1 East to Langley and Hope. Roadway becomes BC-15 South/176 St.

item.title: BC-17 East approaching TC-1
item.description: BC-17 East approaching TC-1 to Hope and Vancouver.

item.title: BC-17 East - 104 Ave
item.description: BC-17 East (South Fraser Perimeter Road) at 104 Ave. Continue east on BC-17 for BC-15 South to USA Border, TC-1 East to Hope, Langley, and Coquitlam.

item.title: Bridgeview Road north at BC-17
item.description: Bridgeview Road north at BC-17 in Surrey. Turn right for BC-17 East to TC-1 and Hope. Turn left for BC-17 West to Delta. Continue north on Bridgeview Road for 116 Ave.

item.title: King George Blvd. South at BC-17
item.description: King George Blvd. South at BC-17. Merge right for BC-17 west and Scott Road. Continue straight for King George Blvd. South to Surrey City Center, Langley, and BC-17 East.

item.title: Approaching End BC-91A North in New Westminster
item.description: Approaching end BC-91A North on the Queensway Bridge in New Westminster. For New Westminster access merge right for Stewardson Way or continue straight for 20th St./6th Ave. Use left lane for Marine Way West to Burnaby.

item.title: BC-91A North - Exit 10
item.description: BC-91 North at Exit 10 - Annacis Island.

item.title: BC-91A North - New Westminster
item.description: BC-91A North to New Westminster, on offramp from BC-91 to BC-91A.

item.title: BC-91 South - Exit 11
item.description: BC-91 south at Exit 11 - To BC-91A North/Annacis Island/New Westminster. Continue south on BC-91 for Delta, Surrey, and Seattle (WA).

item.title: BC-91 South - Exits 13 and 11
item.description: BC-91 south at Exit 13 - Westminster Highway. Approaching Exit 11 - To BC-91A North/Annacis Island/New Westminster.

item.title: BC-91 South - Exit 15
item.description: BC-91 south approaching Exit 15 - Nelson Road.

item.title: BC-91 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-91 south. Distance to Delta, Surrey, and Seattle (USA).

item.title: BC-91 South - Exit 22
item.description: BC-91 south approaching Exit 22 - Knight St./Vancouver. Continue south on BC-91 for North Westminster and North Delta.

item.title: BC-99 South - Exit 37
item.description: BC-99 south at Exit 37 - BC-91 South/New Westminster/North Delta/Surrey.

item.title: BC-99 South - Exit 39A
item.description: BC-99 south at Exit 39A - Shell Road. Continue south on BC-99 for BC-91, USA Border, and Ferry to Victoria and Nanaimo.

item.title: BC-99 South - Exits 39B and 39A
item.description: BC-99 at Exit 39B - Number 4 Road. Approaching Exit 39A - Shell Road. Continue south on BC-99 for BC-91, USA Border, and Ferry to Victoria and Nanaimo.

item.title: BC-99 South - Border Crossing Times
item.description: Vancouver area border crossing times into the USA on BC-99 south. Border crossing times via Peace Arch (BC-99), Pacific X-ING (BC-15), Aldergrove (BC-13), and Sumas (BC-11).

item.title: Sea Island Way at BC-99
item.description: Sea Island Way east at BC-99. Merge right for BC-99 South/To BC-91/New Westminster/Delta/Surrey. Use BC-99 north for Vancouver.

item.title: Sea Island Way East Approaching BC-99
item.description: Sea Island Way East Approaching BC-99 in Richmond. Speed Limit 60 km/h.

item.title: Sea Island Way Approaching BC-99
item.description: Sea Island Way approaching BC-99. Use BC-99 south for TC-1 East to Hope.

item.title: Sea Island Way at Number 3 Road
item.description: Sea Island Way at Number 3 Road. Continue east on Sea Island Way for BC-99 North/Vancouver and BC-99 South/To BC-91/New Westminster/Delta/Surrey.

item.title: Miller Road West at Sea Island Way Ramps
item.description: Miller Road West at Sea Island Way onramp. Turn right onto Sea Island Way for Ferries, Seattle via BC-99, and No. 3 Road.

item.title: BC-99 North - Destinations
item.description: Destinations on BC-99 North (Oak St.). Use BC-99 north for (Vancouver) City Center, Nanaimo and Gibbons Ferry, and Whistler.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exits 41A and 41B
item.description: BC-99 north at Exit 41A - Marine Drive East. Approaching Exit 41B - Marine Drive West. The BC-99 freeway ends after this interchange and becomes a surface street.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exits 41A-B
item.description: BC-99 north approaching Exit 41A - Marine Drive East and Exit 41B - Marine Drive West.

item.title: BC-99 North - Entering Vancouver
item.description: Entering city of Vancouver on BC-99 north. Vancouver is the largest city in the province of British Columbia and the 8th biggest city in Canada.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 39
item.description: BC-99 north approaching Exit 39 - Bridgeport Road/Vancouver - YVR International. Continue north on BC-99 for Vancouver.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exits 36 and 37
item.description: BC-99 north at Exit 36 - Westminster Highway. Approaching Exit 37 - BC-91/North Delta/Surrey. Continue north on BC-99 for Vancouver and Vancouver International Airport.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exits 36 and 37
item.description: BC-99 approaching Exit 36 - Westminster Highway. Approaching Exit 37 - BC-91/North Delta/Surrey. Continue north on BC-99 for Vancouver and Vancouver International Airport (YVR).

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 36
item.description: BC-99 north approaching Exit 36 - Westminster Highway.

item.title: BC-99 North - Next 3 Exits
item.description: Next 3 exits on BC-99 north in Richmond: Westminster Highway, Hwy BC-91, and Bridgeport Road.

item.title: BC-99 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-99 north. Distance to (Vancouver International) Airport, Vancouver, and Surrey (via BC-91).

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 32
item.description: BC-99 at Exit 32 - Steveston Highway.

item.title: BC-99 North - Vancouver and Airport
item.description: Variable message sign on BC-99 North approaching the George Massey Tunnel. Use BC-99 north for Vancouver and Airport

item.title: BC-99 - Exit 26
item.description: BC-99 north at Exit 26 - BC-17 West/Tsawwassen/BC-17A/Ladner River Road. Continue north on BC-99 for Richmond and Vancouver. Use BC-17 West for the Tsawwassen Ferry Terminals.

item.title: BC-99 - Exit 26
item.description: BC-99 approaching Exit 26 - BC-17 West/Tsawwassen/To BC-17A/Ladner.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 20
item.description: BC-99 north at Exit 20 - Ladner Trunk Road/South Delta.

item.title: BC-99 North - Delta
item.description: Entering municipality of Delta on BC-99 North. Next three exits have access to Delta.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 16
item.description: BC-99 North approaching Exit 16. Use Exit 16 for access to TC-1 East to Hope.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 16
item.description: BC-99 north approaching Exit 16 - BC-91 North/North Delta/New Westminster.

item.title: BC-99 North - Vancouver and Richmond
item.description: Alternate routes to Vancouver and Richmond on BC-99 north. Vancouver and Richmond traffic can use either BC-99 or BC-91.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 10
item.description: BC-99 north approaching Exit 10 - King George Blvd/Surrey City Center. Speed Limit - 100 km/h.

item.title: BC-99 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on BC-99 north. Distance to (Tsawwassen) Ferries - 38km; distance to Vancouver - 50km.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 2
item.description: BC-99 north approaching Exit 2 - 16th Ave.

item.title: BC-99 North - Exit 2
item.description: BC-99 north at Exit 2 - To TC-1/8th Ave./White Rock.

item.title: BC-99 - Exit 2
item.description: BC-99 approaching Exit 2 - 8th Ave./White Rock/To TC-1. Continue north on BC-99 to Vancouver.

item.title: BC-99 North - Entering Surrey
item.description: Entering Surrey on BC-99 North. Use next 3 exits on BC-99 for Surrey.

item.title: BC-99 North - Welcome to British Columbia
item.description: Welcome to British Columbia on BC-99 north. Taken just north of Canada Customs.

item.title: BC-99 North - Think Metric
item.description: BC-99 North at US/Canada border. Think metric - 30 km/h was 20 MPH. A smaller sign below that instructs Nexus traffic to keep right.

item.description: BC-13 north at BC-1A to Langley, Aldergrove, and Abbotsford.
